ComicInfo.Summary: The Q Conflict [Part 6]: The Starfleet captains enlist the help of Wesley Crusher, the Traveler, and Q Amanda Rogers to help them fight back against Q. When Q orders the captains to compete for an Omega Molecule, they instead lead an attack against Q using Q Weapons supplied by Amanda. Q brings armies of various alien races to fight on his side, but when the Starfleet officers score a hit on Q, the other male Q appears and orders Q to come to a peace settlement between the Q Continuum, Trelane, the Organians, and the Metrons.
